00021 static
00022 int left_cyclic(double x[], int ldx, int j, int k,
00023                 double cosines[], double sines[])
00024 {
00025     double *lastcol;
00026     int i, jj;
00027 
00028     if (j >= k)
00029         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, j (%d) >= k (%d)"), j, k);
00030     if (j < 0)
00031         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, j (%d) < 0"), j, k);
00032     if (ldx < k)
00033         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, k (%d) > ldx (%d)"), k, ldx);
00034     lastcol = (double*) R_alloc(k+1, sizeof(double));
00035                                 /* keep a copy of column j */
00036     for(i = 0; i <= j; i++) lastcol[i] = x[i + j*ldx];
00037                                 /* For safety, zero the rest */
00038     for(i = j+1; i <= k; i++) lastcol[i] = 0.;
00039     for(jj = j+1; jj <= k; jj++) { /* columns to be shifted */
00040         int diagind = jj*(ldx+1), ind = (jj-j) - 1;
00041         double tmp = x[diagind], cc, ss;
00042                                 /* Calculate the Givens rotation. */
00043                                 /* This modified the super-diagonal element */
00044         F77_CALL(drotg)(x + diagind-1, &tmp, cosines + ind, sines + ind);
00045         cc = cosines[ind]; ss = sines[ind];
00046                                 /* Copy column jj+1 to column jj. */
00047         for(i = 0; i < jj; i++) x[i + (jj-1)*ldx] = x[i+jj*ldx];
00048                                 /* Apply rotation to columns up to k */
00049         for(i = jj; i < k; i++) {
00050             tmp = cc*x[(jj-1)+i*ldx] + ss*x[jj+i*ldx];
00051             x[jj+i*ldx] = cc*x[jj+i*ldx] - ss*x[(jj-1)+i*ldx];
00052             x[(jj-1)+i*ldx] = tmp;
00053         }
00054                                 /* Apply rotation to lastcol */
00055         lastcol[jj] = -ss*lastcol[jj-1]; lastcol[jj-1] *= cc;
00056     }
00057                                 /* Copy lastcol to column k */
00058     for(i = 0; i <= k; i++) x[i+k*ldx] = lastcol[i];
00059     return 0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 static
00063 SEXP getGivens(double x[], int ldx, int jmin, int rank)
00064 {
00065     int shiftlen = (rank - jmin) - 1;
00066     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 4)), nms, cosines, sines;
00067 
00068     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, ScalarInteger(jmin));
00069     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, ScalarInteger(rank));
00070     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 2, cosines = allocVector(REALSXP, shiftlen));
00071     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 3, sines = allocVector(REALSXP, shiftlen));
00072     setAttrib(ans, R_NamesSymbol, nms = allocVector(STRSXP, 4));
00073     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 0, mkChar("jmin"));
00074     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 1, mkChar("rank"));
00075     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 2, mkChar("cosines"));
00076     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 3, mkChar("sines"));
00077     if (left_cyclic(x, ldx, jmin, rank - 1, REAL(cosines), REAL(sines)))
00078         error(_("Unknown error in getGivens"));
00079     UNPROTECT(1);
00080     return ans;
00081 }
00082 
00083 SEXP checkGivens(SEXP X, SEXP jmin, SEXP rank)
00084 {
00085     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2)),
00086         Xcp = PROTECT(duplicate(X));
00087     int  *Xdims;
00088 
00089     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00090         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00091     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00092     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, getGivens(REAL(Xcp), Xdims[0],
00093                                      asInteger(jmin), asInteger(rank)));
00094     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, Xcp);
00095     UNPROTECT(2);
00096     return ans;
00097 }
00098 
00099 SEXP lsq_dense_Chol(SEXP X, SEXP y)
00100 {
00101     SEXP ans;
00102     int info, n, p, k, *Xdims, *ydims;
00103     double *xpx, d_one = 1., d_zero = 0.;
00104 
00105     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00106         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00107     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00108     n = Xdims[0];
00109     p = Xdims[1];
00110     if (!(isReal(y) & isMatrix(y)))
00111         error(_("y must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00112     ydims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(y, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00113     if (ydims[0] != n)
00114         error(_(
00115             "number of rows in y (%d) does not match number of rows in X (%d)"),
00116             ydims[0], n);
00117     k = ydims[1];
00118     if (k < 1 || p < 1) return allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k);
00119     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k));
00120     F77_CALL(dgemm)("T", "N", &p, &k, &n, &d_one, REAL(X), &n, REAL(y), &n,
00121                     &d_zero, REAL(ans), &p);
00122     xpx = (double *) R_alloc(p * p, sizeof(double));
00123     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &d_one, REAL(X), &n, &d_zero,
00124                     xpx, &p);
00125     F77_CALL(dposv)("U", &p, &k, xpx, &p, REAL(ans), &p, &info);
00126     if (info) error(_("Lapack routine dposv returned error code %d"), info);
00127     UNPROTECT(1);
00128     return ans;
00129 }

00132 SEXP lsq_dense_QR(SEXP X, SEXP y)
00133 {
00134     SEXP ans;
00135     int info, n, p, k, *Xdims, *ydims, lwork;
00136     double *work, tmp, *xvals;
00137 
00138     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00139         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00140     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00141     n = Xdims[0];
00142     p = Xdims[1];
00143     if (!(isReal(y) & isMatrix(y)))
00144         error(_("y must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00145     ydims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(y, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00146     if (ydims[0] != n)
00147         error(_(
00148             "number of rows in y (%d) does not match number of rows in X (%d)"),
00149             ydims[0], n);
00150     k = ydims[1];
00151     if (k < 1 || p < 1) return allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k);
00152     xvals = (double *) R_alloc(n * p, sizeof(double));
00153     Memcpy(xvals, REAL(X), n * p);
00154     ans = PROTECT(duplicate(y));
00155     lwork = -1;
00156     F77_CALL(dgels)("N", &n, &p, &k, xvals, &n, REAL(ans), &n,
00157                     &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00158     if (info)
00159         error(_("First call to Lapack routine dgels returned error code %d"),
00160               info);
00161     lwork = (int) tmp;
00162     work = (double *) R_alloc(lwork, sizeof(double));
00163     F77_CALL(dgels)("N", &n, &p, &k, xvals, &n, REAL(ans), &n,
00164                     work, &lwork, &info);
00165     if (info)
00166         error(_("Second call to Lapack routine dgels returned error code %d"),
00167               info);
00168     UNPROTECT(1);
00169     return ans;
00170 }
00171 
00172 SEXP lapack_qr(SEXP Xin, SEXP tl)
00173 {
00174     SEXP ans, Givens, Gcpy, nms, pivot, qraux, X;
00175     int i, n, nGivens = 0, p, trsz, *Xdims, rank;
00176     double rcond = 0., tol = asReal(tl), *work;
00177 
00178     if (!(isReal(Xin) & isMatrix(Xin)))
00179         error(_("X must be a real (numeric) matrix"));
00180     if (tol < 0.) error(_("tol, given as %g, must be non-negative"), tol);
00181     if (tol > 1.) error(_("tol, given as %g, must be <= 1"), tol);
00182     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP,5));
00183     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, X = duplicate(Xin));
00184     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00185     n = Xdims[0]; p = Xdims[1];
00186     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 2, qraux = allocVector(REALSXP, (n < p) ? n : p));
00187     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 3, pivot = allocVector(INTSXP, p));
00188     for (i = 0; i < p; i++) INTEGER(pivot)[i] = i + 1;
00189     trsz = (n < p) ? n : p;     /* size of triangular part of decomposition */
00190     rank = trsz;
00191     Givens = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, rank - 1));
00192     setAttrib(ans, R_NamesSymbol, nms = allocVector(STRSXP, 5));
00193     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 0, mkChar("qr"));
00194     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 1, mkChar("rank"));
00195     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 2, mkChar("qraux"));
00196     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 3, mkChar("pivot"));
00197     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 4, mkChar("Givens"));
00198     if (n > 0 && p > 0) {
00199         int  info, *iwork, lwork;
00200         double *xpt = REAL(X), tmp;
00201 
00202         lwork = -1;
00203         F77_CALL(dgeqrf)(&n, &p, xpt, &n, REAL(qraux), &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00204         if (info)
00205             error(_("First call to dgeqrf returned error code %d"), info);
00206         lwork = (int) tmp;
00207         work = (double *) R_alloc((lwork < 3*trsz) ? 3*trsz : lwork,
00208                                   sizeof(double));
00209         F77_CALL(dgeqrf)(&n, &p, xpt, &n, REAL(qraux), work, &lwork, &info);
00210         if (info)
00211             error(_("Second call to dgeqrf returned error code %d"), info);
00212         iwork = (int *) R_alloc(trsz, sizeof(int));
00213         F77_CALL(dtrcon)("1", "U", "N", &rank, xpt, &n, &rcond,
00214                          work, iwork, &info);
00215         if (info)
00216             error(_("Lapack routine dtrcon returned error code %d"), info);
00217         while (rcond < tol) {   /* check diagonal elements */
00218             double minabs = (xpt[0] < 0.) ? -xpt[0]: xpt[0];
00219             int jmin = 0;
00220             for (i = 1; i < rank; i++) {
00221                 double el = xpt[i*(n+1)];
00222                 el = (el < 0.) ? -el: el;
00223                 if (el < minabs) {
00224                     jmin = i;
00225                     minabs = el;
00226                 }
00227             }
00228             if (jmin < (rank - 1)) {
00229                 SET_VECTOR_ELT(Givens, nGivens, getGivens(xpt, n, jmin, rank));
00230                 nGivens++;
00231             }
00232             rank--;
00233             F77_CALL(dtrcon)("1", "U", "N", &rank, xpt, &n, &rcond,
00234                              work, iwork, &info);
00235             if (info)
00236                 error(_("Lapack routine dtrcon returned error code %d"), info);
00237         }
00238     }
00239     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 4, Gcpy = allocVector(VECSXP, nGivens));
00240     for (i = 0; i < nGivens; i++)
00241         SET_VECTOR_ELT(Gcpy, i, VECTOR_ELT(Givens, i));
00242     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, ScalarInteger(rank));
00243     setAttrib(ans, install("useLAPACK"), ScalarLogical(1));
00244     setAttrib(ans, install("rcond"), ScalarReal(rcond));
00245     UNPROTECT(2);
00246     return ans;
00247 }
00248 
00249 SEXP dense_to_Csparse(SEXP x)
00250 {
00251     CHM_DN chxd = AS_CHM_DN(PROTECT(mMatrix_as_geMatrix(x)));
00252     /* cholmod_dense_to_sparse() in CHOLMOD/Core/ below does only work for
00253        "REAL" 'xtypes', i.e. *not* for "nMatrix".
00254        ===> need "_x" in above call.
00255 
00256        Also it cannot keep symmetric / triangular, hence the
00257        as_geMatrix() above.  Note that this is already a *waste* for
00258        symmetric matrices; However, we could conceivably use an
00259        enhanced cholmod_dense_to_sparse(), with an extra boolean
00260        argument for symmetry.
00261     */
00262     CHM_SP chxs = cholmod_dense_to_sparse(chxd, 1, &c);
00263     int Rkind = (chxd->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? Real_KIND2(x) : 0;
00264     /* Note: when 'x' was integer Matrix, Real_KIND(x) = -1, but *_KIND2(.) = 0 */
00265     R_CheckStack();
00266 
00267     UNPROTECT(1);
00268     /* chm_sparse_to_SEXP() *could* deal with symmetric
00269      * if chxs had such an stype; and we should be able to use uplo below */
00270     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxs, 1, 0/*TODO: uplo_P(x) if x has an uplo slot*/,
00271                               Rkind, "",
00272                               isMatrix(x) ? getAttrib(x, R_DimNamesSymbol)
00273                               : GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00274 }

00276 
00277 SEXP dense_band(SEXP x, SEXP k1P, SEXP k2P)
00278 /* Always returns a full matrix with entries outside the band zeroed
00279  * Class of the value can be [dln]trMatrix or [dln]geMatrix
00280  */
00281 {
00282     int k1 = asInteger(k1P), k2 = asInteger(k2P);
00283 
00284     if (k1 > k2) {
00285         error(_("Lower band %d > upper band %d"), k1, k2);
00286         return R_NilValue; /* -Wall */
00287     }
00288     else {
00289         SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(x));
00290         int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym)),
00291             j, m = adims[0], n = adims[1],
00292             sqr = (adims[0] == adims[1]),
00293             tru = (k1 >= 0), trl = (k2 <= 0);
00294         const char *cl = class_P(ans);
00295         enum dense_enum { ddense, ldense, ndense
00296         } M_type = ( (cl[0] == 'd') ? ddense :
00297                     ((cl[0] == 'l') ? ldense : ndense));
00298 
00299 
00300 #define SET_ZERO_OUTSIDE                                \
00301         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {                       \
00302             int i, i1 = j - k2, i2 = j + 1 - k1;        \
00303             for (i = 0; i < i1; i++) xx[i + j * m] = 0; \
00304             for (i = i2; i < m; i++) xx[i + j * m] = 0; \
00305         }
00306 
00307         if(M_type == ddense) {
00308             double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00309             SET_ZERO_OUTSIDE
00310         }
00311         else { /* (M_type == ldense || M_type == ndense) */
00312             int *xx = LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00313             SET_ZERO_OUTSIDE
00314         }
00315 
00316         if (!sqr || (!tru && !trl)) { /* return the *geMatrix */
00317             UNPROTECT(1);
00318             return ans;
00319         }
00320         else {
00321             /* Copy ans to a *trMatrix object (must be square) */
00322             SEXP aa= PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(M_type == ddense? "dtrMatrix":
00323                                                    (M_type== ldense? "ltrMatrix"
00324                                                     : "ntrMatrix"))));
00325             /* Because slots of ans are freshly allocated and ans will not be
00326              * used, we use the slots themselves and don't duplicate */
00327             SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_xSym,       GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00328             SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_DimSym,     GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00329             SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_DimNamesSym,GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00330             SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00331             SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_uploSym, mkString(tru ? "U" : "L"));
00332             UNPROTECT(2);
00333             return aa;
00334         }
00335     }
00336 }

00338 SEXP dense_to_symmetric(SEXP x, SEXP uplo, SEXP symm_test)
00339 /* Class of result will be [dln]syMatrix */
00340 {
00341     int symm_tst = asLogical(symm_test);
00342     SEXP dx = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(x));
00343     SEXP ans, dns;
00344     const char *cl = class_P(dx);
00345     /* same as in ..._geMatrix() above:*/
00346     enum dense_enum { ddense, ldense, ndense
00347     } M_type = ( (cl[0] == 'd') ? ddense :
00348                 ((cl[0] == 'l') ? ldense : ndense));
00349 
00350     if(symm_tst) {
00351         int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym)), n = adims[0], i,j;
00352         if(n != adims[1]) {
00353             UNPROTECT(1);
00354             error(_("ddense_to_symmetric(): matrix is not square!"));
00355             return R_NilValue; /* -Wall */
00356         }
00357 #define CHECK_SYMMETRIC                                                 \
00358         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)                                         \
00359             for (i = 0; i < j; i++)                                     \
00360                 if(xx[j * n + i] != xx[i * n + j]) {                    \
00361                     UNPROTECT(1);                                       \
00362                     error(_("matrix is not symmetric [%d,%d]"), i+1, j+1); \
00363                     return R_NilValue; /* -Wall */                      \
00364                 }
00365         if(M_type == ddense) {
00366 
00367             double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00368             CHECK_SYMMETRIC
00369         }
00370         else { /* (M_type == ldense || M_type == ndense) */
00371 
00372             int *xx = LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00373             CHECK_SYMMETRIC
00374         }
00375     }
00376 
00377     dns = GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00378     if(!equal_string_vectors(VECTOR_ELT(dns,0),
00379                              VECTOR_ELT(dns,1))) {
00380         /* need _symmetric_ dimnames */
00381         if(*CHAR(asChar(uplo)) == 'U')
00382             SET_VECTOR_ELT(dns,0, VECTOR_ELT(dns,1));
00383         else
00384             SET_VECTOR_ELT(dns,1, VECTOR_ELT(dns,0));
00385     }
00386 
00387     /* Copy dx to ans;
00388      * Because slots of dx are freshly allocated and dx will not be
00389      * used, we use the slots themselves and don't duplicate */
00390     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS( M_type == ddense ? "dsyMatrix" :
00391                                         (M_type == ldense ? "lsyMatrix" :
00392                                          "nsyMatrix"))));
00393     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym,        GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00394     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym,      GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym));
00395     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, dns);
00396     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,     ScalarString(asChar(uplo)));
00397 
00398     UNPROTECT(2);
00399     return ans;
00400 }
00401 
00402 SEXP ddense_symmpart(SEXP x)
00403 /* Class of the value will be dsyMatrix */
00404 {
00405     SEXP dx = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(x));
00406     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym)), n = adims[0];
00407 
00408     if(n != adims[1]) {
00409         UNPROTECT(1);
00410         error(_("matrix is not square! (symmetric part)"));
00411         return R_NilValue; /* -Wall */
00412     } else {
00413         SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dsyMatrix"))), dns;
00414         double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00415         int i,j;
00416 
00417         /* only need to assign the *upper* triangle (uplo = "U");
00418          * noting that diagonal remains unchanged */
00419         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00420             for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
00421                 xx[j * n + i] = (xx[j * n + i] + xx[i * n + j]) / 2.;
00422             }
00423         }
00424 
00425         dns = GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00426         if(!equal_string_vectors(VECTOR_ELT(dns,0),
00427                                  VECTOR_ELT(dns,1))) {
00428             /* need _symmetric_ dimnames */
00429             SET_VECTOR_ELT(dns,0, VECTOR_ELT(dns,1));/* ==> uplo = "U" */
00430         }
00431 
00432         /* Copy dx to ans;
00433          * Because slots of dx are freshly allocated and dx will not be
00434          * used, we use the slots themselves and don't duplicate */
00435 
00436         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym,        GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00437         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym,      GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym));
00438         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, dns);
00439         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,     mkString("U"));
00440 
00441         UNPROTECT(2);
00442         return ans;
00443     }
00444 }
00445 
00446 SEXP ddense_skewpart(SEXP x)
00447 /* Class of the value will be dgeMatrix */
00448 {
00449     SEXP dx = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(x));
00450     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym)), n = adims[0];
00451 
00452     if(n != adims[1]) {
00453         UNPROTECT(1);
00454         error(_("matrix is not square! (skew-symmetric part)"));
00455         return R_NilValue; /* -Wall */
00456     } else {
00457         SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix"))), dns;
00458         double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00459         int i,j;
00460 
00461         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00462             xx[j * n + j] = 0.;
00463             for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
00464                 double s = (xx[j * n + i] - xx[i * n + j]) / 2.;
00465                 xx[j * n + i] =  s;
00466                 xx[i * n + j] = -s;
00467             }
00468         }
00469 
00470         dns = GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00471         if(!equal_string_vectors(VECTOR_ELT(dns,0),
00472                                  VECTOR_ELT(dns,1))) {
00473             /* need _symmetric_ dimnames */
00474             SET_VECTOR_ELT(dns,0, VECTOR_ELT(dns,1));/* uplo = "U" */
00475         }
00476 
00477         /* Copy dx to ans;
00478          * Because slots of dx are freshly allocated and dx will not be
00479          * used, we use the slots themselves and don't duplicate */
00480 
00481         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym,        GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_xSym));
00482         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym,      GET_SLOT(dx, Matrix_DimSym));
00483         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, dns);
00484         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,     mkString("U"));
00485 
00486         UNPROTECT(2);
00487         return ans;
00488     }
